request_buf_size_bytes.description: The default buffer size for network communications. Must be greater than 0.

request_retry_interval_sec.description: The default retry timeout for network communications. Must be greater than 0.

empty_chunks_dir.description: A path to a folder where Qserv master stores its empty chunk lists. Must be non-empty.

http_server_port.description: The port number for the controller's HTTP server. Must be greater than 0.

http_server_threads.description: The number of threads managed by BOOST ASIO for the HTTP server. Must be greater than 0.

job_heartbeat_sec.description: The heartbeat interval for jobs. A value of 0 disables heartbeats.

job_timeout_sec.description: The default timeout for completing jobs. Must be greater than 0.

num_threads.description: The number of threads managed by BOOST ASIO. Must be greater than 0.

request_timeout_sec.description: The default timeout for completing worker requests. Must be greater than 0.

host.description: The host name of the MySQL server where the Replication system maintains its persistent state. Note that this parameter can't be updated through the Configuration service as it's set up at the startup time of the Replication/Ingest system.

name.description: The name of a MySQL database for a service where the Replication system maintains its persistent state. Note that this parameter can't be updated through the Configuration  service as it's set up at the startup time of the Replication/Ingest system.

password.description: A password for the MySQL account where the Replication system maintains its persistent state

port.description: The port number of the MySQL server where the Replication maintains its persistent state. Note that this parameter can't be updated through the Configuration service as it's set up at the startup time of the Replication/Ingest system.

qserv_master_services_pool_size.description: The pool size at the client database services connector for the Qserv Master database.

qserv_master_tmp_dir.description: The temporary folder for exchanging data with the Qserv 'czar' database service.

qserv_master_user.description: The MySQL user account of a service where Qserv 'czar' maintains its persistent state.

services_pool_size.description: The pool size at the client database services connector.

user.description: The MySQL user account of a service where the Replication system maintains its persistent state. Note that this parameter can't be updated through the Configuration service as it's set up at the startup time of the Replication/Ingest system.

fs_buf_size_bytes.description: The default buffer size for file and network operations at Replication worker's file service.

num_exporter_processing_threads.description: The number of request processing threads in each Replication worker's data exporting service.

num_fs_processing_threads.description: The number of request processing threads in each Replication worker's file service.

num_http_loader_processing_threads.description: The number of request processing threads in each Replication worker's HTTP-based ingest service.

num_loader_processing_threads.description: The number of request processing threads in each Replication worker's ingest service.

num_svc_processing_threads.description: The number of request processing threads in each Replication worker service.

technology.description: The name of a technology for implementing replica management requests at workers.

data_dir.description: The default data directory from which the worker file service serves files to other workers. This folder is required to be the location where the MySQL service of Qserv worker stores its data.

exporter_port.description: The default port for the worker's table export service.

exporter_tmp_dir.description: The default location for temporary files stored by the worker's table export service before returning them a client.

fs_port.description: The default port for the worker's file service.

http_loader_port.description: The default port for the worker's HTTP-based REST service for ingesting table contributions into the adjacent Qserv worker's MySQL database.

http_loader_tmp_dir.description: The default location for temporary files stored by the worker's HTTP-based REST service ingesting table before ingesting them into the adjacent Qserv worker's MySQL database.

loader_port.description: The default port for the worker's binary file ingest service.

loader_tmp_dir.description: The default location for temporary files stored by the worker's binary file ingest service before ingesting them into the adjacent Qserv worker's MySQL database.

svc_port.description: The default port for the worker's replication service.

auto_notify.description: Automatically notify Qserv on changes in replica disposition.

host.description: The service location (the host name or an IP address) of XRootD/SSI for communications with Qserv.

port.description: A port number for the XRootD/SSI service needed for communications with Qserv.

request_timeout_sec.description: The default timeout for communications with Qserv over XRootD/SSI.
